title: Deranged Sleep Routines
itunes:title: Deranged Sleep Routines
description:
Listen. Is it a coincidence that shortly after Ku and Su did a two-part shower routine, celebs started tweeting about how they don’t bathe their children or wash their hair? We’re not sure, so we’re trying it out again, but this time with sleep. Get cozy and put on your sleep uniform (are you a Ku, with a soft mini dress? Or are you a Su, clad like a 1920’s newsboy?) Let the aunties take you right to zzz land. 

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • Ku's sleep uniform: https://bit.ly/eberyjay
  • Ku's air purifier: https://bit.ly/airdoctorpurifier
  • Ku's water cleanser: https://bit.ly/hanskincleanser
  • Ku's other cleanser: https://bit.ly/goodlightcleanser
  • Ku's exfoliant: https://bit.ly/naturiumexfoliant
  • Ku's essence: https://bit.ly/misshaessence
  • Ku's eye cream: https://bit.ly/goopgenes
  • Ku's ampoule: https://bit.ly/misshaampoule
  • Ku's serum: https://bit.ly/goodlightserum
  • Sola Wave: https://bit.ly/solawavetherapy
  • Ku's lip mask: https://bit.ly/laneigesleepmask
  • Ku's moisturizer: https://bit.ly/retinolcomplexcream
  • Ku's sleep mask: https://bit.ly/lioelesleepmasks
  • Su's "hiking" socks: https://bit.ly/dickieshikingsocks
  • Su's noise machine: https://bit.ly/dohmsleepmachine
  • Su's air filter: https://bit.ly/blueairfilter
  • Su's mist: https://bit.ly/knoursmist
  • Su's face oil: https://bit.ly/bluntmoonrockcbdfaceoil
  • Su's favorite essential oil: https://bit.ly/susessentialoils
  • Su's massager: https://bit.ly/lanshinaceramassager
  • Su's pillow: https://bit.ly/buckwheatpillow

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium.
